# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Accesses a contiguous range of windows.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(bounds: Range<Int>) -> Slice<SlidingWindows<Scalar>> { get }
```

## Parameters

- **bounds**: A range of valid indices in the classification distribution.
title: subscript(_:)
